title: FS: Large Lot of Lower Grade Hassan T205 w/ Many HOF & SP **ALL SOLD**

posts.post_title: FS: Large Lot of Lower Grade Hassan T205 w/ Many HOF & SP **ALL SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale. These mostly have nicer looking fronts with varying amounts of paper loss on the backs, as the scans will show.  All have Hassan backs.

Please add $3 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

**ALL CARDS ARE SOLD. THANKS FOR LOOKING**
I will take Leever, Phelps, Quinn Elberfield, Criger, and Beck
They are all yours, Larry!  I sent you a PM with more info.  Thanks very much!

I'll take Red Dooin.
PM sent.
Ben
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Shoutout and endorsement for Marc. He played a critical role in helping me complete both my low grade T205 and T206 sets. Great person to deal with.

Thanks for that kind message, Todd!  I haven't been too active on the board over the past couple of years, but I actually have quite a few low to mid-grade T205, T206, and some other assorted things that I will be listing here soon, so if that's your thing...stay tuned!

Marc,
